snippet: Militants of the Nusra Front, who have links to Al Qaeda, have blown up the 13th-century tomb of a revered Islamic scholar in southern Syria, according to Syria’s state news agency.
abstract: Nusra Front militants blow up 13th-century tomb of revered Islamic scholar in southern Syria.
lead_paragraph: Militants of the Nusra Front, who have links to Al Qaeda, have blown up the 13th-century tomb of a revered Islamic scholar in southern Syria, according to Syria’s state news agency.

headline.main: Syria: Militants Destroy Tomb of 13th-Century Scholar
headline.print_headline: Syria: Militants Destroy Tomb of 13th-Century Scholar
